attributes.action: Include the Welsh Dragon on the Union flag to show welsh identity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A great many people in Wales do not acknowledge the Union Jack flag as they do not believe it represents Wales today. The welsh dragon is representative of Wales and should be included on the Union Jack in some form.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
